com.receiver2d.engine.geometry

Class Point2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector
      • org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f
        • com.receiver2d.engine.Vector2D
          • com.receiver2d.engine.geometry.Point2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.lwjgl.util.vector.ReadableVector, org.lwjgl.util.vector.ReadableVector2f, org.lwjgl.util.vector.WritableVector2f

    public class Point2D
extends Vector2D
    A special case of a Vector2D, a Point2D is useful for geometry, which unlike a Vector2D, is linked to other points. This enables fast search-and-replace methods within a large n-sided polygon.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
